text: The Pastor Joseph Prince was exceptional n full of energy.He gave his sermons to 60,000 Christian all over Singapore
Beautiful place where beautiful people come to be filled with joy of the Lord! Every Sunday is a celebration fro me here at NCC!
The place is amazing, attended one of the service, was very powerful, you can feel the holy spirit presence. Love every bits of it.

A must visit place if you are looking for divine intervention! You cannot miss the warmth, generosity and the love you get here! What you will find here? Amazing Christian  music, soul stirring and inspiring messages, lot of love, and real encounter with  God!

Great worship music when we went. Teaching: Mixture of good but one-sided Gospel truth and of heresy. It is always about prosperity, success, improvement, and healing as a proof of God's favor.  The newest think (?)... take communion and experience healing and prosperity: "Eat you way to improvement of all sort!" They come up with all of that because they do not preach sanctification; it is replaced by prosperity preaching as the only practical application left. Brainwashing if one is exposed to this kind of teaching for some time.
